question:
How to make text bold in OneNote

Choices:
A: Locate the text you wish to make bold, and highlight it. On the top of the screen, click the "B" button to make it bold.
B: Locate the text you wish to make bold, and highlight it. On the bottom of the screen, click the "U" button to make it bold.
steps: To make text bold in OneNote, you need to interact with the formatting options available in the application.
First, locate the text you wish to modify. Highlight the text to select it.

Next, you need to find the button that corresponds to the bold formatting option. This button is typically clearly labeled with a "B" symbol, which is the shorthand for bold in most text editing applications.
In OneNote, the formatting toolbar is typically located at the top of the screen, similar to other word processors.
Since the "B" button for making text bold is located at the top of the screen in OneNote, that makes choice A the correct answer.
